comment.author: 29050464@N06
comment._content: The basket at bottom appears to be a fine old Pima from central Arizona. The name of this pattern escapes me.

comment.author: 29050464@N06
comment._content: Item Photos of exhibit objects at the exhibition "American Form" which opened at the House of Artists January 16, 1954. Society for Applied Art was the organizer, while the exhibition was produced by the Museum of Modern Art in New York. -- translation from Google
